deadsky.config.vanilla_rebalance.totemt_: Time (in ticks) until the item can be used again. (0 to disable)

item.deadsky.raw_void_metal.description: The chunks of Endstone on this are brittle.

item.deadsky.void_metal_block.descriptio: So cold that it is hard to carry.
item.deadsky.void_metal_shield.descripti: When something hits this they will suffer!
